props.title: Understanding Java Variables
props.question: Which of the following correctly declares an integer variable named count with an initial value of 5 in Java?
props.explanation: In Java, the data type comes first (int), followed by the variable name (count), then the assignment operator (=), and finally the value (5). The statement must end with a semicolon.
